resources.string: Why my Pincode is not here?
It is because our service is not available there.
How can I be the Service-Provider at HelperGenie?
In About us , you can get Contact to us . We tell Procedure for test and appropriate documents you need.
How can identify that the Service-Provider is from HelperGenie?
Our Service-Provider has ID-card with QR-code to recognize.
What is minimum version of Android required?
What are the Payment method available?
You can payment through Cash-on-delivery,Debitcard,Paytm,UPI and Netbanking
